snippet: A proposed law in California would make it harder for parent companies to sever ties with franchisees. How high-end juices extract high prices from customers. And the creator of the original pop-up ad apologizes.
abstract: A proposed law in California would make it harder for parent companies to sever ties with franchisees. How high-end juices extract high prices from customers. And the creator of the original pop-up ad apologizes.

headline.main: Today in Small Business: A Start-Up About Nothing
